actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 5:00 p.m. on March 21, 2023.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that she had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on March 16, 2023, at 4:09 p.m.: That the Senate agreed to S. Res. 110. Appointment: United States Senate Caucus on International Narcotics Control.

actions-list.header: Board of Visitors to the United States Air Force Academy
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 10 U.S.C. 9455(a), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Board of Visitors to the United States Air Force Academy: Mr. Pfluger and Mr. Lamborn.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Brian K. Fitzpatrick to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
